rainfalls: As of today, there is no Heavy Rainfall Warning Issued.
thunderstorms:
Thunderstorm Advisory No. 10 #NCR_PRSD

Issued at: 12:51 PM, 15 June 2025(Sunday)



Moderate to heavy rainshowers with lightning and strong winds are expected over Bulacan, Quezon, Laguna, Cavite, Batangas, Metro Manila, Rizal, Zambales and Bataan within the next 2 hours.



All are advised to take precautionary measures against the impacts associated with these hazards which include flash floods and landslides.



Keep monitoring for updates.
